sentences.sContent: He noticed two policemen coming towards him.
sentences.sCn: 他注意到两名警察正朝他走来。

sentences.sContent: All the windows face toward the river.
He was standing with his back towards me.
Brian’s attitude towards his work has always been very positive.
sentences.sCn: 布赖恩的工作态度向来非常积极主动。

trans.tranOther: used to say that someone or something moves, looks, faces etc in the direction of someone or something
